item.title: Inventory adjusted
item.description: Indicates a change in inventory level

item.title: Order cancelled
item.description: Indicates an order has been canceled

item.description: Indicates inventory is out of stock

item.title: Return initiated
item.description: Event that is emitted when a return is initiated.

item.description: Indicates an order has been confirmed

item.description: Indicates an order has been changed

item.title: Shipment created
item.description: Event that is emitted when a shipment is created.

item.title: Delivery failed
item.description: Event that is emitted when a shipment delivery fails.

item.title: Shipment delivered
item.description: Event that is emitted when a shipment is delivered.

item.title: Shipment dispatched
item.description: Event that is emitted when a shipment is dispatched.

item.title: Shipment in transit
item.description: Event that is emitted when a shipment is in transit.

item.description: An event that is triggered when a new user subscription has started

item.description: Event is triggered when a user initiates a payment through the Payment Service

item.description: An event that is triggered when a users subscription has been cancelled

item.description: Event is triggered after the payment has been successfully processed
